Cloud Kicks (CK) has implemented different sales stages across its varied product lines. CK wants to deploy Collaborative Forecasting to all sales users.

Which two statements should a consultant consider when enabling forecasting? (Choose two.)

choices.C: The Forecast tab should be visible to easily view the forecasts.
choices.D: A Single Category or Cumulative Forecast Rollup should be defined.
choices.B: Opportunity Splits must be enabled at the same time.
choices.A: Multiple Forecast Types must be created and activated.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: AC
AC it is

Opportunity splitting is not required for collaborative forecasting

questions.question_text:
Sales reps at Universal Containers (UC) want to know when a customer or prospect Contact opens an email they sent so they can follow up with the Contact shortly afterward.

Which tool should a consultant recommend to meet the requirement?

choices.C: Create two sales processes and two page layouts; assign them to two different opportunity record types for each product line.
choices.A: Create two page layouts and two sales processes; assign them to the respective product lines to collect relevant information.
choices.D: Create two page layouts, one opportunity record type, and one workflow rule to assign the correct page layout to the record type.
choices.B: Create one page layout, two sales processes, and validation rules to capture relevant opportunity information.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
C is correct.

Selected Answer: C
C is correct.
